verbs.description: as [ARG0: both parties] [V: play] [ARG1: the blame game] our fiscal future hangs in the balance this is fiscal insanity the federal deficit grew 17 percent to 779 billion in the fiscal year just ended but that not the worst of the problem by the administration own estimate the deficit will increase almost 40 percent to nearly 1 1 trillion in the current fiscal year with few policymakers batting an eye this disturbing trend has no end in sight congress president kennedy united states congress washington congressional budget office john f kennedy united states sears president partner akabas supplemental nutrition assistance program steven mnuchin america shaw house financial services msn federal government federal government of the united states editor microsoft
